name: Space Blaster (Amr Moataz)
description:
New Updates:
  1. For Game and level Design
    1. Five consecutive levels with a starting pop-up story to read.
    2. Two levels for a boss fight (level 4, level 5).
  2. For Game-play and UI
    1. Created boss ship with different fighting styles.
    2. Add Lives text.
    3. Added enemy base to respawn new enemies.
  3. For Graphics and Audio
    1. Changed MainMenu UI with new buttons and inputs.
    2. Added new music for gameplay and main menu (music changes over levels and spans through some levels).
